text: Mother, Jugs & Speed is a 1976 American black comedy movie directed by Peter Yates and stars Bill Cosby, Harvey Keitel, Raquel Welch, Allen Garfield, Larry Hagman, Bruce Davison and Toni Basil. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about automobiles Category:1970s English-language movies Category:African-American movies Category:1976 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies
title: Mother, Jugs & Speed
